tooltip: Name used to persist the resulting data in a table, topic or queue. If this field is left blank Sparta will use the transformation name instead.
Name used to save the discarded data in a table, topic or similar. If this field is left blank Sparta will use the transformation name with '_discard' instead.
Name used to save the error data in a table, topic or similar. If this field is left blank Sparta will use the transformation name instead.
